# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. I believe in its quality and am confident it could be beneficial to you. I am offering this product to you for $125, which reflects its true worth and the time and effort invested into its creation. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to potentially making this valuable addition to your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
